product_name: Fire Ant Fighter Ant Bait (1 lb)
description:
How to use

Measure. Sprinkle around mounds or broadcast. Keep dry. Let ants carry. (Confirming minimal effort and maximum results.)

sections.faq:
How to apply Fire Ant Fighter
Apply when ants are active, above 60°F in early morning or late evening. Keep bait dry. Do not water in.
For mounds, sprinkle 4 tablespoons around small mounds or 6 tablespoons around large mounds.
For prevention, broadcast 1/3 to 2/3 cup per 1,000 sq ft.
When should I reapply Fire Ant Fighter?
Reapply as needed for heavy infestations. In warmer months, broadcast every other month to help prevent new mounds.
Can I use Fire Ant Fighter with other Sunday products?
Sure can. Apply any liquid lawn or repellent products first and let them dry completely. Then place bait. Keep bait dry. If bait gets wet, reapply.
Is Fire Ant Fighter safe for kids and pets?
This is still a pesticide, so use it as directed. Place bait carefully and keep children and pets away from treated mounds and baited areas until the bait is collected by ants or removed as directed on the label.
